attributes.action: Require TV Advertisements For Cars To Display Energy Efficiency Ratings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To help buyers make informed choices regarding vehicle pollution and to reduce the fantasies promoted by TV car advertisements, all television commercials for cars should carry the simple, 'Red to Green', 'A to G', energy efficiency rating, for the vehicle MAINLY featured. This is a familiar and easily understandable symbol portraying the most important fact about any motor vehicle.
